statements: SELECT * FROM appointments
SELECT appointment_id, customer_id, mechanic_id FROM appointments
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, mechanic_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT mechanic_id, appointment_time, customer_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_time DESC
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, mechanic_id FROM appointments WHERE mechanic_id = 123 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE mechanic_id IN (111, 222, 333) AND customer_id = 456 ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(appointment_id) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT mechanic_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY mechanic_id ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE customer_name='John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-08-15';
SELECT appointment_date, customer_name FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE customer_name='Alice Smith' AND appointment_date >= '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-18';
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM appointments JOIN services ON appointments.appointment_id = services.service_id WHERE appointments.customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE mechanic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty FROM mechanics ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_price FROM services WHERE service_price > 100.00;
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_date, mechanic_name FROM appointments JOIN mechanics ON appointments.mechanic_id = mechanics.mechanic_id ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty FROM mechanics ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, customer_name FROM appointments WHERE mechanic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_price FROM services WHERE service_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;

SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM mechanics JOIN appointments ON mechanics.mechanic_id = appointments.mechanic_id GROUP BY mechanics.mechanic_id ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date, service_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= CURRENT_DATE
SELECT appointments.id, customer_name, mechanic_name, experience_years FROM appointments INNER JOIN mechanics ON appointments.id = mechanics.id
SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM services
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT mechanic_name, experience_years FROM mechanics WHERE specialization = 'Engine Repair' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appointment_time, service_type FROM appointments JOIN services ON appointments.service_type = services.service_name WHERE appointments.appointment_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT customer_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments JOIN customers ON appointments.customer_name = customers.customer_name WHERE customers.contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT service_name, price FROM services WHERE price >= 50;
SELECT appointment_id, technician_name, status FROM appointment_history JOIN technicians ON appointment_history.technician_id = technicians.technician_id WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT appointment_id, customer_name, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, customer_name FROM appointments WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT services.service_name, services.price, technicians.technician_name FROM services JOIN appointment_history ON services.service_id = appointment_history.service_id JOIN technicians ON appointment_history.technician_id = technicians.technician_id WHERE technicians.specialty = 'Electronics' ORDER BY services.price DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT repair_shops.shop_name, repair_shops.location, appointment_history.status FROM repair_shops JOIN technicians ON repair_shops.shop_id = technicians.technician_id JOIN appointment_history ON technicians.technician_id = appointment_history.technician_id WHERE appointment_history.status = 'Completed';
